senses.sense_definition: A town in south-west Greater London, England (properly Richmond upon Thames).

examples.text: They decided to spend the day exploring <w>Richmond</w> Park in London.

target_lang_translations.ru: Они решили провести день, исследуя <w>Ричмонд</w>-парк в Лондоне.

target_lang_definitions.ru: Город на юго-западе Большого Лондона, Англия (официально Ричмонд-апон-Темс).

senses.sense_definition: A surname derived from the English place name.

senses.sense_definition: A male given name transferred from the surname.

senses.sense_definition: An English dukedom.

examples.text: The Duke of <w>Richmond</w> holds an ancient English dukedom.

examples.text: The <w>Richmond</w> dukedom has a long and storied history.

traits.comment: Refers to a historical noble title
